title: Configuration
description: The configuration which is contained inside the `release-change.config.json` file

branches.description: The branches on which releases should happen

dryRun.description: Whether to activate the dry-run mode or not

releaseType.description: The release type configuration on the branches on which the releases should happen

patternProperties.description: The name of the branch used as a property key

channel.description: The distribution tag associated with the releases when publishing to NPM

prerelease.description: Whether the release should be treated like a pre-release or not

prereleaseIdentifier.description: The identifier to use when tagging a pre-release version

dependencyUpdateMethod.description: The method to use to update internal dependencies in a monorepo

npmPublish.description: To prevent package publishing to NPM
